channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Unveils Olympic Opening Ceremony Uniforms
item.description: Taiwan has revealed its Olympic opening ceremony uniforms to the public. This year's outfits were again designed by Taiwanese designer Justin Chou.

item.title: One Dead, 6 Injured in Residential Block Blast in Southern Taiwan
item.description: One person has died and six have been injured after a gas explosion in Taiwan's southern port city of Kaohsiung. The blast occurred around midnight and fires spread across three re

item.title: TSMC Founder Morris Chang Receives Civilian Medal for Tech Contributions
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen has awarded TSMC founder Morris Chang the Order of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, the second-highest civilian medal in Taiwan, for his contributions to Taiwan's high-tech

item.title: Students Protest Lingering Gender Inequality in Education in Taiwan
item.description: A group of students say 20 years after a landmark gender equality law passed, there are still serious gender-based inequities in education.
